Issue.summary: Fabric-tools 2.0 docker image: wrong path upon loading OrdererClient config
Issue.description: *peer lifecycle chaincode approveformyorg* execution entails searching for *orderer.tls.rootcert.file* in a nonexistent path: /opt/gopath/src/*github.cm*/hyperledger/fabric/. This path is not updated upon environment vars so it is sort of "hardcoded" in the container
